Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Harlem (O'Hare). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Harlem (O'Hare).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
